sub_title: Sustainability Consultant | Raw Materials | LCA | Circular Economy | Innovative Natural Resources Management
summary:
Supporting SYSTEMIQ to tackle global sustainability challenges with a systemic approach.

Experienced in providing detailed LCA's for cobalt and lithium. Previous experience in environmental and social LCA on lithium-ion batteries from electric vehicles in the EU within a circular economy approach. 

Master's Degree from Erasmus Mundus in the SINReM Program - International Master of Science in Sustainable and Innovative Natural Resource Management at the universities of Ghent, Uppsala, and Freiberg, with a major focus on Circular Societies. My master thesis consisted of evaluating the social and environmental impacts of lithium-ion batteries from electric vehicles and how a circular economy can help the battery sector to reach the policies of the new European Green Deal. 

Geologist graduated from the University of São Paulo. The experience in managing contaminated areas was acquired with a two-year internship in the Environmental Diagnosis sector of BTX Geology and Environment and as a Trainee in Arcadis Young Talent Program in the Environment sector.
